#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		double n,k,m,n1;
		//cin>>n>>k>>m;
		scanf("%lf%lf%lf",&n,&k,&m);
		n1=k;
		long int count=0;
		m=m/n;
		while(n1<=m)
		{
			
			n1=n1*k;
			count++;
		}
		printf("%ld\n",count);
	}
	return 0;
	
}
